cards.rules_text: Exile target creature. You may return it to the battlefield under its owner's control. If you don't, return it to its owner's hand.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“I helped save the universe. And then I died. But that isn't the end of the story. Fate, it seemed, had other plans.”
—Nightcrawler[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Vigilance
Whenever Blink deals combat damage to a player, exile target creature you control, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.

Flash
When Cable enters, return target artifact, instant, or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Nothing here is what it seems . . . and right now, you're the only one left who can help me save the future.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Reach
When Mirage enters, tap up to one target creature and put a stun counter on it. If you controlled that creature, draw a card. [i](If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead.)[/i]

Flash
When Nightcrawler enters, scry 1.
Whenever Nightcrawler attacks, exile him. After blockers are declared, return him to the battlefield. If it's his owner's combat phase, he enters tapped and attacking.

Flying
When Pixie enters, scry 1. Then if you control another Mutant, draw a card.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Mutant pixie nightmare girl, that's me. Cursed by an actual demon or two . . .”[/i]
cards.notes:
https://marvelsnapzone.com/variants/pixie-08/

alternate art which would need editing: https://marvel.fandom.com/wiki/Megan_Gwynn_(Earth-65)

!group portalhoppers
!sort 01

cards.rules_text:
Flash
When this enchantment enters, exile up to one target creature, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.
{3}{U}: Exile up to one target creature, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.

As an additional cost to cast this spell, return a creature you control to its owner's hand or pay {1}.
Counter target spell.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“Mercy is my name. But it is not my way.”
—Psylocke[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Ninjutsu {1}{U} [i]({1}{U}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.)[/i]
Whenever Psylocke deals combat damage to a player, you may draw two cards. If you do, discard two cards.

Whenever Shadowcat enters or phases in, if you don't control a creature named Lockheed, create Lockheed, a legendary 2/2 blue Alien Dragon creature token with flying.
At the beginning of your end step, Shadowcat phases out. [i](Treat it and anything attached to it as though they don't exist until its controller's next turn.)[/i]
cards.artist: R.-A. Height, L. Welch, T. Washington
cards.notes:
Kitty Pryde and Lockheed by Ray-Anthony Height, Larry Welch, and Tony Washington

https://au.pinterest.com/pin/159033430566986990/

!group portalhoppers
!sort 05

cards.rules_text: Put target creature or spell on top of its owner's library.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“I've been from the future to the past and back again . . . but I've run out of time.”
—Cable[/i]

cards.rules_text: You may have Warlock enter as a copy of any permanent on the battlefield, except his name is Warlock and he's an artifact in addition to his other types.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Excuse self. Apologies. Self mourns your soldiers. But self will not mourn YOU!”[/i]
cards.notes:
https://marvel.fandom.com/wiki/Warlock_(Earth-616)/Gallery?file=X-Men_Vol_7_19_Warlock_Virgin_Variant.jpg

Alternate art: https://marvel.fandom.com/wiki/Warlock_(Earth-616)/Gallery?file=Warlock_%28Earth-616%29_from_New_Avengers_Vol_4_14_001.png

Lines: Paco Medina
Inker: Juan Vlasco

!group portalhoppers
!sort 07

cards.rules_text:
Flying
Exhaust — {4}: Scry 2, then put two +1/+1 counters on H.E.R.B.I.E.. Activate only as a sorcery. [i](Activate each exhaust ability only once.)[/i]

Whenever you draw a card, put a +1/+1 counter on Mister Fantastic.
At the beginning of your end step, if you control four or more modified creatures, create a 2/2 colorless Robot creature token. [i](Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.)[/i]

Flash
When Invisible Woman enters, put a shield counter on target creature you control. [i](If it would be dealt damage or destroyed, remove a shield counter from it instead.)[/i]
cards.notes:
MRV art (Adam Hughes): https://marvel.fandom.com/wiki/Susan_Storm_(Earth-616)/Gallery?file=Invisible_Woman_Vol_1_1_Textless.jpg

negative space (Evan Shaner): https://marvel.fandom.com/wiki/Susan_Storm_(Earth-616)/Gallery?file=Fantastic_Four_Vol_5_644_Shaner_Variant_Textless.jpg

!group fantasticfour
!sort 01

cards.rules_text:
Ward {2} [i](Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.)[/i]
You may have modified creatures you control deal combat damage as though they weren't blocked. [i](Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.)[/i]

Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. It can't be blocked this turn.
Flashback {4}{U} [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)[/i]

Menace
Creatures you control with counters on them have menace.
At the beginning of combat on your turn, put a +1/+1 counter on another target creature you control.

Carnage enters with a +1/+1 counter on it.
Whenever another creature you control dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Carnage.
When Carnage dies, put its counters on target creature you control.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“In my experience, it isn't the “alone” part people want to avoid. It's the dying.”[/i]
cards.artist: M. Bagley, A. Hennessy, D. Sánchez-Almara

cards.rules_text: When Scream dies, each opponent loses X life and you gain X life, where X is its power.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“I've never been so scared in all my life. Or so angry.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature deals damage to an opponent, you may draw a card.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“I swear to you, Reed Richards. I will keep the children safe from any threat in this Multiverse. On that you have my word.”
—Dragon-Man[/i]
cards.artist: Carlos Pacheco, Rafael Fonteriz, & Matt Yackey

!group fantasticfour
!sort 08

cards.rules_text:
Flying
Whenever Human Torch attacks, if he's modified, you may switch his power and toughness until end of turn. [i](Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.)[/i]
Counter target spell unless its controller pays twice {X}.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“I beg you to keep a cool head until I can calculate some way of alleviating the situation.”
—Mister Fantastic[/i]

cards.rules_text:
[i](As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)[/i]
Draw two cards, then discard a card.
Distribute a flying, vigilance, prowess, and +1/+1 counter among up to four target creatures you control. [i](Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, a creature with prowess gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)[/i]
​
cards.special_text:
[i](As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)[/i]
Draw two cards, then discard a card.
Distribute a flying, vigilance, prowess, and +1/+1 counter among up to four target creatures you control. [i](Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, a creature with prowess gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Flying
When Dragon Man enters, look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a creature, Aura, or Equipment card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

Ward {1}
When Namor enters, create Trident of Neptune, a legendary Equipment artifact with “Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and has vigilance” and equip {3}.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“In the name of Father Neptune, the victory is truly mine! Imperius Rex!”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Choose one—
• Untap target creature and put a shield counter on it. [i](If it would be dealt damage or destroyed, remove a shield counter from it instead.)[/i]
• Tap target creature and put a stun counter on it. [i](If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead.)[/i]

Ward—Discard a card.
When Knull enters, you may sacrifice another creature. If you do, create a 3/3 black Symbiote Dragon creature token.
{4}{B}{B}: Symbiotes you control get +2/+2 and gain deathtouch until end of turn.
cards.artist: Ryan Stegman, JP Mayer, Frank Martin Jr.

cards.rules_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay 1 life. If you do, create a 1/1 black Symbiote creature token with “This token can't block” and “When this token dies, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.”

Flash
When Anti-Venom enters, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. It gains indestructible until end of turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“You have a sickness. I am the cure!”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
You draw a card and you lose 1 life. 
Create a 1/1 black Symbiote creature token with “This token can't block” and “When this token dies, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.”
Flashback {4}{B} [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)[/i]

!group symbiotes
!sort 10

cards.rules_text:
Destroy target creature.
Put a +1/+1 counter on a creature you control. It becomes a Symbiote in addition to its other types.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Neither one of us can survive without the other. Forget host. Forget symbiote. There is only Carnage.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Scorn enters with X +1/+1 counters on it.
{3}{B}: Return Scorn from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“There is no right. No wrong. No black or white. There is only life and death. Blood and the abyss. Truth is chaos.”[/i]

cards.rules_text: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is 3 or the greatest power among creatures you control, whichever is greater.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“You're strong. We can feel you trying to fight back. But it's no use.”
—Red Goblin[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Deathtouch
Whenever Toxin attacks, you may sacrifice another creature. If you do, create two 1/1 black Symbiote creature tokens with “This token can't block” and “When this token dies, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.”

Flying
Whenever one or more creatures you control with counters on them deal combat damage to a player, exile the top card of that player's library. Until end of turn, you may play that card, and mana of any type can be spent to cast it.
